languages.text: Every 9th successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and/or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by the psyker and their allies combined grants the psyker +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Каждое девятое успешное {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и/или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} псайкера или его союзников (при суммарном подсчете) предоставляет псайкеру +2 дополнительных {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} в следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Every 9th successfull dodge and/or parry by the Psyker and their allies combined grants the Psyker +2 additional AP the next turn.
